line: (from inside) Enough moping around, Candace. (cut to inside Candace's room where Candace is sitting on her bed, she approaches her.) Phineas and Ferb said they've devised a fun way to wash the house. Why don't you join them? Have some fun for a change!
For a change? I have lots of fun!
You mean, obsessively trying to bust your brothers for their mystery crimes? Is that "fun"?
I have fun. I'm like the queen of fun! I have fun all day!
I can tell. Well, if you just sit inside today, you should at least do a little reading.
Aw, Mom?
It's one of my favorites.
The Wizard of Oz. Isn't this for babies?
Or you could wipe down Perry's platypus plaza play set.
(Opens book) I'm reading, I'm reading!
Well, I'll be at my weight lifting class. Have fun!
Ah! Oh, my eyes hurt! (to a picture of Jeremy) Oh, Jeremy, you're the only one who understands-
Hi, Candace!
AHH! Buford, Baljeet, what do you two want?
What, like in a metaphysical sense? Nothing. I'm good.
I want to be cool!
That's not gonna happen.
I mean, why are you looking in my window, duh!
Oh, Ferb says I should tell you we're about to start washing the house, and you can help us out if you want!
Not likely.
Either way, you might want to put on some waterproof undergarments.
Will you get out of here?!?
(opens book again) Blah blah Dorothy, blah blah Kansas. There's a cyclone coming?
Okay Ferb, let her lift.
(Flies off bed) AH!
Take your positions everybody! And remember, even strokes.
Do you guys always wash the house like this?
Sometimes, we give it a bath,
but the city's using the tub as a reservoir.
Whoa! What's happening? (Gargling) Phineas! Ferb!
Okay. Full speed now!
(echoes) Try to have fun!
(echoes) I want to be cool!
(echoes) Hello.
(echoes) I don't want nothin'!
(echoes) Waterproof undergarments! Wheeeeeeeee!
(echoes) Hey! I wonder where Perry went?
Ew! Gross! Perry!
Oh, wow! (Her perspective of a different landscape) Perry, I don't think we're in Danville anymore.
You're in Patchkinland! We're Patchkins, and we welcome you because,... (sing-song) Little Witch Suzy was a louse, now she's squished under your house!
(muffled) I'm alright!
I have saliva.
Gross!
Eyeball!
Eyeball! Eyeball!
What'cha doin'? (walks up to Candace) I'm The Good-Witch, Isabella. Welcome to Patchkinland!
(muffled) Hello?! Can someone get this off me?!
(shouting in the background) Don't touch those boots!!!
Witch! Witch! Witch!
Not witch, Warlock! It's a robe! Not a dress!
I suppose I should thank you for squishing little Suzy.
(muffled) I'm okay, if you'd just lift this house off me!
But I won't, because I'm wicked! Heeheehee. I'll just take these little boots, and be right on my--
What? What happened?!? Where are my boots?!?
Right there... on Candace.
(muffled) Now my feet are cold.
Give me those boots!
She doesn't have to give you anything! You have no real power in this part of Odd!

Wrong! I have the power of positive thinking! True, it doesn't really... help me this instance, but you can't stay in Patchkinland forever! That's right! I'll get you,... and your little platypus too.
(Growls back defiantly)
Now, check me out as I disappear into an evil cloud of black smoke! Ha ha!
You know, I'm just gonna use my bus pass.
(muffled) Seriously! Can someone get a jack or something?
I don't know how, but I bet Phineas and Ferb are behind all of this!
Oh, hi, Candace!
I knew it!
Have fun!
Wait! Stop! How did you--? (Growls in frustration, then walks toward The Good-Witch, Isabella)
Alright, Eyeball girl! Where can I go to bust someone around here?
You can always try Bustopolis. That's where the wizard lives.
Can the wizard bust my brothers?
You bet'cha!
How do I get there?
Well, listen to this.
♪ Ooo-hoo! Ooo-hoo! Ooo-hoo! La-la-la-la-la-la-la. ♪
♪ Well, the sky is blue and the breeze is mellow. ♪
♪ Ooo-hoo! La-la-la-la-la-la-la. ♪
♪ Just take the yellow one, not the one that's burnt umber ♪
What?
♪ A log truck overturned last Tuesday ♪
♪ Ooo-hoo! Ooo-hoo! ♪
Nothing to see here, move along.
♪ If you wanna bust your brothers ♪
♪ You're going nowhere! ♪
♪ So, if you're really in a busting mood, ♪
♪ Ooo-hoo! Ooo-hoo! Ooo-hoo! La-la-la-la-la-la-la! ♪
So, remember, if you wanna bust your brothers, stay on the yellow sidewalk! (floats away)
I hope there's not gonna be a lot of singing in this thing. (sighs) How much further is this "Bustopolis"?
For some of us, it is a world away!
What are you supposed to be?

I am a nerdcrow. I hang in cornfields, wedgie-style, to keep the crows away. They would not be caught dead anywhere around me. For you see, despite of my above average mathematical skills, I am not cool.
That's fascinating. But, I'm on my way to Bustopolis to ask the wizard to bust my brothers.
The Wizard?!? (falls to the ground) Oof! Do you think the wizard can do something for me?
What do you want?
Allow me to put it in song!
(interrupting) Alright! That's enough!
I get it. You want to Bustopolis and ask the wizard for coolness, right?
(eagerly) Do I!
Fine, you can come along.
Boy, howdy!
But, no singing, and don't stand too close. Too close!
Sorry.
(singing in background) ♪ Ooo-hoo! Ooo-hoo! Ooo-hoo! La-la-la-la-la-la-la-- ♪

Hi, Candace! So, you two on your way to Bustopolis? 'Cause Ferb and I made a more fun way to get there. We've built a beautiful horse path through a candy forest, and genetically engineered some unicorns to ride.
Oh, no. No, we are staying on the yellow sidewalk.
Do I have a say in this matter?
No. Let's go!
Yes, Candace.

Sorry you're gonna miss out on all of the fun! (to Ferb) I'll race you to marshmallow meadow, Ferb. (while riding unicorn with Ferb down the horse path) Well, this is fun. It's a little girly for us, isn't it?
Well, it is Candace's dream.
It's not witch! It's warlock! Argh! Let me just check my security.
Ooh! Oh! Gross!

Hey. I know you... you're with that little boot thief, right? Well, I'm going to send out my flying squirrels after her! (sighs) Those stunning little planes, they're cute, but, you know, that they don't fly so fast. We've got some time.
How much farther do we have to go?
All I know is, Phineas and Ferb are behind all this, and if I follow this sidewalk, I will bust them.
Wait a minute, I know this. There should be an oil can around here.
(clears throat) Could you leave the lumberjack alone?
Jeremy? Forget this! (throws the rusted tin man away, a crash is heard) Oh, hi! I-I couldn't help, but notice that you're, um...
A tree?
A-ttractive.
It's OK. I know I'm a tree.
Well, we're gonna go and see if the wizard can go and grant our wishes. Uh,...do you have a wish?
Do I have a wish?
♪ Would you take a good look at me, I stand before you as a tree. And you ask me what my wish would be. ♪
How come he gets to sing--
(covering Nerdcrow's mouth) Shhhh.
♪ It's probably related to me being a tree. ♪
♪ (Tree-Related Wish) ♪
♪ It's my tree-related wish. ♪
♪ (Tree-Related Wish) ♪
♪ It's my tree-related wish. ♪
♪ (Tree-Related Wish) ♪
♪ I'll tell you what it is when we get to Bustopolis. ♪
Oooo. I can't wait to find out. Come on, let's go.
Aren't you just going to wish not to be a tree?
Shhh.
Girls like a little mystery.
♪ La-la-la-la-la-la-la-- ♪
Hi, Candace. From this point, you have two routes to Bustopolis.
On your right is a yellow sidewalk through a terrifying beastbog.
We have saliva!
And on your left, Ferb and I have built a frozen non-dairy treat sidewalk through an ice cream canyon. You can skate it and lick it for the ultimate favorable fun.
Ice Cream, ICE CREAM!!!
Oh, no, you don't! We're staying on this sidewalk until we meet the wizard and you're busted.
Crow, Tree, let's go!
Yes, Candace.
Well... there is only one thing left to do.
Whoo-hoo! Yeah! Whoo-hoo!
This is better than an ice cream canyon, isn't it?
Oh, yes, I much prefer rotting vegetation and blood-sucking demons.
Sure are some scary looking trees in here.
Hey, we can't all be movie stars.
I... I... I think there's something up there.
Whoo?!
AHH!
What is that?
Where?
There!
It looks like a lion.
No, looks like a tiger.
I think it is a bear.
No, I'm a combination lion, tiger, and bear.
Oh, my!
If I had a nickel every time I heard that...

All right! Let's blow this pop stand! (pauses) What? (another pause) Oh, fine. (at Lion-Tiger-Bear Guy (Buford)) My friends and I are going to Bustopolis to each get something from the Wizard. Do you want to come? There!
Nah. I don't want nothin'.
Ok. Chop, chop, fellas! Time's a-waistin'.
But I am reminded of a song.
♪ I... waaaaaaaaaaant... ♪ Nothin.
Well, at least it was short. Come on!
Yes, Candace.
♪ La-la-la-la-la-la-la-- ♪
Hi, Candace. You guys could continue walking through this damp bog, and that would be awesome. But if you'd like to take the more fun route to Bustopolis, Ferb and I have built...
A blue sidewalk?
A bouncy sidewalk! What do you say, Candace?
I think you already know my answer. Step it up, freaks!
Yes, Candace.
Ok, have fun!
(growls in frustration)
Soon those boots will be mine! In the meantime, I'm going to leave you in the capable hands of my spider-monkey, or maybe a monkey-spider. I don't know what he is. Hehehe.
(laughs, then grabs Agent P's fedora; only to get punched by a boxing glove) Owww!
Bouncy sidewalk. I'm keeping my eyes on the prize!
Hey, what's that?
Looks like a squadron of flying squirrels!
AHHHH!!!!
Hey! What are you doin'? Ow, ow, ow! I can't believe I'm doin' this for nothin'!
I wish I was still hanging by my underwear! Just kidding!
Come on! I'm a tree! I'm friends with squirrels! ... Oh, snap. (to Nerdcrow (Baljeet)) Oh, that's got to hurt.
You get use to it.
Squirrels! Squirrels! Whoaaaa! AHHH!
Oh, no. The squirrels have got Candace!
We've got to do something!
I got nothin'.
Oh, hey, Candace. We're taking the bouncy sidewalk. Of course, your way looks fun, too.
I'm not having fun, and neither will you if I ever get back to the yellow sidewaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaalk!
Part II
Okay. Kidnapped by flying squirrels and stuck in a web that came out of a monkey's butt. Hm. Well, I guess I have had weirder days.
There you are, Perry.
Silence! I've got you now, missy. You may as well hand over those boots.
I would, but they've kind of grown on me.
I know. They're nice, aren't they? And the color really set off your eyes.
No, really. They've grown on me. I can't take them off.
If I can't take the boots off of you, I have to get you out of the boots, and by that, I mean, disintegrate you entirely!
Perry, I'm sorry I got you into this mess. Forget about me. Save yourself if you can.
Well, if it's that easy...
Ahhh! Get him off of me! Ahh! He could have rabies! ... Oh, I hate spider webs! ... Guards!
Uh. ... Ready?
Yep.
Getting our wishes will not be the same without Candace.
I miss her, too, even if she was a little bossy.
I need a firm hand.
Look! It is Candace's pet platypus. Has he always have that hat?
What's he want?
Could be rabies.
Gentlemen, we're out to stop Doofenwitch. You want to rescue the girl. I see an opportunity for some inter-agency cooperation. Now, here's the plan. Wait, why am I a fairy?

See this hourglass? When this sand runs out, that’s when this big electric timer begins. And when that time runs out, it activates the Brat-Begone-Inator to vaporize you right out of your boots! Haha!
Ooo! Someone is at my door! (opens door) Hello?
Hi! You've been selected for a free haunted castle makeover from Witches Brew magazine.
Not witch! Warlock!
What about the dress?
It's a robe! Whatever, I'm not going to turn down a free makeover. Come on in. I'll show you around.
I see you have a bunch of spider webs. Sure, they're classic, but overdone. We say it's more of a modern witch.
Warlock!
Yeah, whatever.
Hey! Weren't you taller? ... Perry! Quick! Get me out of here before that whatever -inator zaps me. ... Haha! That tickles! (giggles)
I like it!
Ooh! My Begone-Inator! I'm going to check my crystal ball.
Why did you do that?
It's part of the makeover.
Wait a minute! Guards! Again!
Dude.
I'm good.
Run for it!
Don't let them escape!
Candace! Perry!
Ahahaha! How convenient! Everyone's all together.
Yeah, we're kind of expected in Bustopolis. You know; the Wizard, great and powerful.
Shut up! You're a tree!
Wait a minute! You can't talk to Jeremy like that!
Put that bucket down!
Melt, evil witch!
You little brat! This outfit is 100% cotton. ... Oh, it's shrinking! It's shrinking! I have to go to change my clothes.
Sorry, I only meant to melt you.
Guards! Dispose of them while I switch into my track suit.
Dispose of us?!? You... you really don't want to do that, do you?
Well, no, but nobody ever asked us what we want to do.
'Well, what do you want to do?
There's a little number we've been working on. Hit it, boys.
♪ Well, we've been cooped up in this castle, ♪
What the hey! Everyone gets to sing but me?
♪ Now then boys, let's make some noise! Kick up your heels and dance! Hey! ♪

I'm back! Sheesh, no need to celebrate. I've been gone a minute. Wait! Where are my prisoners? ... Oh, they're escaping, you fools! After them! Raise the drawbridge!  ... Oh, great! The monkey is the only one working here!
Great! Now what? ... No way!
Hold on!
Ahhhhh!!!!
Curse you...! Ahhh!!! I'll get you! Ahhh!!! Oh, forget it.
Hey, Candace! Isn't this fun?
Fun? Not if you think so! ... Huh? ... Squirrel! Squirrel!
Wow, tough luck, and over the Sea of Razor Sharp Rock Spires, too. ... Good thing it's so inappropriately named.
Hey! Look over there!
Bustopolis! Come on!
The stuff Phineas and Ferb made! It’s all here! The ultimate bust!
Follow the yellow...!
Oh, shut up!
Well! (gets trampled)
Fun way to the top, Candace?
Forget it! I'm taking the yellow stairs! (Runs up said stairs)
Three please.
Hello? I'm Candace the me and... ... Whoa! ... Guys, you're making look bad in front of the Wizard.
Um, hello? I would like speak to the Wizard, please.
Hello, Candace.
Mom? You're the Wizard?
Well, I'm a whiz at the kitchen.
This time the boys are so busted! Have you seen what they're been up to?
Up to? Why, no. I...
Oops, that's the oven. Boys, could you hand out the gifts while I check on the casserole?
Hey, Candace.
Phineas? Ferb? But... but... but... but...
Does this mean I will not receive coolness?
Well, coolness is such a rare and indefinable quality that a few people really have it. Most people wear a pair of these and fake it.
Hey, works for me, chili cheese.
Yeah, don't over-sell it. (to Jeremy-Tree) So, Jeremy-Tree. You want to be a real boy instead of a tree, hmm?
Well, yeah, but I'll bet you don't have anything in your bag for me.
The problem with you is, you're completely delusional.
I am?
Sure. You've been a real boy all along. You're just wearing a tree costume.
He's right. There's a zipper right back here. Hey, let me get that off for you. (unzips the tree-suit)
(gasps) I'm free!!!... and I'm in my underwear… (Jeremy quickly covers up his underwear)
Yes. Yes, you are.
Yes, I want nothing.
Some people say they want nothing when really they want something.
Not really. I'm cool, man.
You might want something later.
Nothing!
You sure?
Alright! I'll take something! (grabs a sandwich from the bag) Ooo, a ham sandwich. I did want that.
And there's one more person with a wish.
Wait a minute! If you think you could bribe me or something...
I'll get you, my pre... (falls from the ceiling)
And here he is now.
I want...those red rubber boots!
Sure. Candace won't mind. Right, Candace?
Well, yeah, but they won't come off.
Ferb?
A red rubber shoe horn? Why didn't I think of that? That's it?
Yep. Have fun!
♪ Well, my wardrobe, it used to be duller, ♪
Look!
Broom me!
Ughh, I didn't get to finish my song.
That's just great! Everybody gets what they want except me.
I'm back. Now, what were you're saying, Candace?
Mom, you've got to bust Phineas and Ferb!
Bust them for what?
Unicorn-pony rides, non-diary frozen treat ice cream ice skating, bouncy sidewalks.
They sound like fun! Oh, you must have a wonderful time.
Fun? Are you kidding? I didn't have any fun! I followed the yellow sidewalk like I was told.
Who told you to do that?
The Good Witch... in the floating eyeball.
Oh, her. That's what she tells everybody.
Take the yellow sidewalk. Take the yellow sidewalk. Take the yellow sidewalk.
All this time, the boys were only try to show you the fun way to go. The joy is in the journey, you know. (winks)
So, you're telling me that I could have fun throughout this entire adventure if only I stepped off the yellow sidewalk and join my doofus brothers? Is that it?
On the nosy. Loosen up, sweetheart. Remember to have fun along the way. Summer won't last forever.
But I want to have fun. I can do it. Really! I'm a fun person!
Good bye, dear. Mustn't overcook my vegetables.

Wait! Don't go! I haven't had fun yet! (Starts spinning around in the pink portal from before) Hey, what's happening? No! No! I'm waking up! I don't want to! This isn’t fair! I didn’t have any fun! No! No!
Hi, Candace. (to Perry) Oh, there you are, Perry. (to Candace) We just built a self-balancing monster unicycle. It can take us anywhere the fun way. Want to join us?
Are you kidding? When I tell Mom what you guys are up to... Did you say fun?
Often, the most fun you can be found in your own backyard.
And the joy...is in the journey... Okay! I'm in!
Cool!
Oh, Jeremy! Hi! Let's go!
More fun than taking the sidewalk, huh, Candace?
You have no idea.
(From the back of the screen) Have fun, everybody!
